# Measurement.AttributedStyle

**Structure**

A type that provides localized representations of measurements with an attributed string.

## Declaration

```swift
@dynamicMemberLookup struct AttributedStyle
```

## Overview

Use either the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Measurement/formatted()] or the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Measurement/formatted(_:)] instance method of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Measurement] to create an attributed string representation of a measurement.

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Measurement/formatted()] method generates a string using the default measurement format style.

## Comparing Measurement Attributed Styles

- **==(_:_:)**: Compare two measurements of the same `Dimension`.

## Structures

- **Measurement.AttributedStyle.ByteCount**: A format style that converts byte counts into attributed strings.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**

## Formatting a Measurement

- **formatted()**: Generates a locale-aware string representation of a measurement using the default measurement format style.
- **formatted(_:)**: Generates a locale-aware string representation of a measurement using the provided measurement format style.
- **Measurement.FormatStyle**: A type that provides localized representations of measurements.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- FormatStyle
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
